briefTitle: A Sleep Laboratory Study to Investigate the Safety and Efficacy of the Rotigotine Skin Patch in Subjects With Restless Legs Syndrome and End-Stage Renal Disease Requiring Hemodialysis
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group, Polysomnography Study to Investigate Safety and Efficacy of the Rotigotine Transdermal Patch in Subjects With Restless Legs Syndrome and End-Stage Renal Disease Requiring Hemodialysis
summary:
This is a sleep laboratory study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Rotigotine in subjects with Restless Legs Syndrome and End-Stage Renal Disease requiring hemodialysis.

The objectives are to demonstrate superiority of Rotigotine against Placebo as well as to investigate the effect of Rotigotine on quality of life and sleep.

primaryOutcome.measure: Ratio From Baseline to the End of the 2-week Maintenance Period in Periodic Limb Movement Index (PLMI)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Baseline over the Up-Titration Period (up to 3 Weeks) to the end of the 2-Week Maintenance Period
